summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, adding a new Section, 23.49.041, to the Seattle Municipal Code to establish a Transfer of Development Credits (TDC) Program, amending codified maps to designate 9th Avenue as a Green Street; and amending Sections 23.49.008, 23.49.026, 23.49.058, 23.49.068, 23.49.076, 23.49.078, 23.49.134, 23.49.136, 23.76.026, and 23.86.030 of Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
